data.title: Miguel Ferrer Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Miguel Ferrer on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Miguel Ferrer including Mulan, Iron Man 3, and more.
data.text:
School of Hard Knocks

Gaby intends to get even with a parent volunteer at Juanita's school; Bree makes a discovery about her daughter's business.

Witch's Lament

Gaby, Lynette and Bree must try to move the body of Gaby's stepfather; Susan's internship is less art-related than she expected; Lynette feels competitive with Tom's new girlfriend.

The Art of Making Art

Susan gets embarrassed when her art teacher asks his students to be naked during class; Renee takes reluctant Lynette to a singles bar; Carlos, overwhelmed by guilt, hits rock bottom.

Saving Grace

Miguel Ferrer ('Lateline') guest-stars as Nathan, a successful New York publicist who hires Grace (Debra Messing) to decorate his office on the condition that Will (Eric McCormack) agrees to date him. Meanwhile, Jack (Sean Hayes) uses Karen (Megan Mullally) to teach Will how to kiss someone he finds unattractive.
